title: Google updated the Pixel-exclusive Recorder app with a landscape UI, and it’s awfully tablet-y
content:
The Recorder app found on Pixel phones was updated this month with various Material You tweaks and a handy Quick Settings tile. Recorder also introduced a landscape mode that would look awfully good on a Pixel tablet.

more…

The post Google updated the Pixel-exclusive Recorder app with a landscape UI, and it’s awfully tablet-y appeared first on 9to5Google.
